ECUACIONES LINEALES - Ejercicio 14 - ft. Casio Classwiz

\begin{aligned}\n&\text { CASIO }[\mathrm{LA} 55 \mathrm{WI} / \mathrm{ZLAX}\\\n&(2 x-1)^{2}+(x-1)(3-x)=\\\n&(2 x)^{2}-2(2 x)(1)+(1)^{2}+3=1=3\left(x^{2}+2 x\right.\\\n&4 x^{2}-4 x+\left[x-x^{2}-1\right] x^{2}+10 x+2\\\n&\begin{array}{c}\n{3 x^{2}-3 x+2} \\\n{2-5 x}\n\end{array}\n\end{aligned}[imath]{3 x^{2}-3 x+2} [/imath] [imath]{2-5 x}[/imath]
